attributes.action: Apolgise for the Amritsar massacre that took place in April 13th 1919
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jallianwala Bagh massacre: Unarmed men, women and children were massacred. The firing lasted for 10 to 15 minutes, till they ran out of ammunition. Official British Raj sources placed the fatalities at 379, and with 1100 wounded.Civil Surgeon Dr. Smith indicated that there were 1,526 casualties.
